_header: Sithen the siege and the assault was ceased at Troy
Title(s): Sir Gawain and the Green Knight
Subjects: Christmastide; romances; beheading game; Gawain, stories of
_description: Sir Gawain and the Green Knight — 2530 alliterative lines in stanzas with rhyming wheel and bob

BLCottNeroAX.First Lines:
Siþen þe sege and þe assaut watz sesed at
                    TroyeÞe borȝ brittened and brent to brondez and
                    askez…
BLCottNeroAX.Last Lines:
…Now þat bere þe croun of þorneHe bryng vus to
                    his blysse
BLCottNeroAX.Note:
Followed by motto of the Order of the Garter, ‘Hony soyt qui
                        mal pence’.
